P004692.project_name: Minburi - Lat Krabang Industrial Estates Project

keywords.cdata: accelerated depreciation,accounting,administrative costs,agricultural production,agriculture,Balance Sheet,Balance Sheets,bunds,business taxes,capital goods,compacting,Comparative Advantages,competitiveness,Construction,Current Assets,Current Market Price,debt,decentralization,Deficits,drainage system,economic fluctuations,economic growth,Economic Rate of Return,Economic Situation,effective demand,effluents,Employment,Entrepreneurship,expenditures,export growth,Exports,Fiscal Year,Forecasts,foreign exchange,GDP,Gross Domestic Product,growth rate,high levels,Housing,imports,Income,Industrial Sector,industrial sites,industrial use,intermediate goods,internal cash generation,labor force,Land Use,m2,Manufacturing industry,market prices,natural resource base,oil,pollution,population growth,Project Management,pumps,reservoirs,sewage,state enterprises,Technical Assistance,telecommunications,Terms of Trade,transport,urban congestion,value added,water supply,wealth,wells

project_abstract.cdata: The project consists of (a) acquisition and development of 162 ha of land at Lat Krabang (35 km east of Bangkok) into industrial sites; (b) construction of about 10 km of internal roads and a surface drainage system; (c) installation of an internal power and street lighting distribution system connecting with an external 25 MW capacity substation lines; (d) installation of a water supply and distribution system, including fire hydrants; (e) installation of sewage disposal and waste treatment facilities; (f) installation of radio telephone system connected to an automatic branch exchange to provide initially a minimum of about 120 telephone lines; (g) construction of five standard factory buildings of about 2100 sq m each, of which four will be located within the Export Processing Zone to be established on about 20 ha of the estate; (h) construction of an administration building, housing units for essential personnel and a maintenance workshop; and (i) engineering/architectural services and technical assistance.

P004692.docty: Project Completion Report,Loan Agreement,Guarantee Agreement,Memorandum & Recommendation of the President,Staff Appraisal Report
